metaData.name: AI Risk Management Framework
metaData.description: The AI Risk Management Framework (NIST AI RMF) provides a set of guidelines for identifying, assessing, and managing risks associated with AI systems to promote trustworthy and responsible AI.
metaData.relationToAISecurity: The framework addresses AI security by providing guidelines for ensuring the security, robustness, and reliability of AI systems, and mitigating risks related to AI technologies.

conversionProcess: Downloaded the PDF from the official NIST website
Converted the PDF to text or Markdown format
Performed cleanup and structured the data into CSV and JSON formats
